name: Luke Inn
description:
LUKE INN - A STORY ABOUT LOVE SUMMARY

Luke Inn, is a game about a guy, Luke, that doesn’t have anything, no money, no friends and and no happiness. He received a letter that his family died a couple days ago and a friend of his father and mother asked him to go see their old house. This friend asks him to stay there to help him recover the house because it was his father and mother final wish to Luke make this old house an Inn, so he can have a good life. In the way you found a lot of good people in the city, that you will help and they will help you too. You have to find your own happiness making new friends and jobs. Each job have different scenes and each day you have to make different activities, and help your friends, so you can find your true happiness.

CONTROLS
  • WASD - Move the cursor and the main character, Luke!
  • Enter - Confirm!
  • Backspace - Cancel!
  • Q - Open the Quest Log!
  • M - Open the Map!
  • P - Open the Save and Exit menu!
  • I - Open the Bag!
  • F4 - Fullscreen! (By the way, I think it's better this way!)

*The button F is for the Friendship List, but isn't a option that is usable for now, it will be added in another update!
